page.title: 04The Changing Times (cont)
page.content: On the village green there was a YMCA hut which was given to the village by the army. The children of the village went to Waddingham school which was built in { 1830. The children had two weeks off school to go potato picking. The only means of transport from the village to Brigg was a horse and cart until in 1937 a bus was bought. {1940}Forty-Five years ago people who could afford it had electricity.A few people had telephones and most had radios. The sewerage was built in this year as was part of the new school. In this year 20 war evacuees were brought to the village. {1945}Forty years ago it was common for all people to have electricity. Every year there was a Waddingham Show.
